page.title: 09Religion in Thirsk & Sowerby
page.content: There are seven places of worship, all belonging to the Council of Churches, except the Jehovah's Witnesses. {St. Mary's, Thirsk (C of E)}Electoral Roll - 223. Baptisms in l984 - 37 infants, 3 adults. {St.Oswald's,Sowerby (C of E)}Electoral Roll - l59. Baptisms in l984 - 32 infants, 3 adults. {St. James on the Green (Methodist)} Full members - 5O, asssociate members 8O, Baptisms ln l984 - nil. {Sowerby Methodist Church} Full members ll9, associate members 285. Baptisms in l984 - 2 {Meeting House, Kirkgate (The Society {of Friends (Quakers)) }- l9 members {All Saints, Thirsk (R.C.),}near the town centre. {Kingdom Hall, (Jehovah's Witnesses) { John-Paul Wordsworth
